elements.name: Create a room booking

steps.name: user hits endpoint "api/booking"
user books the room with details "depa","july","user.nsbd@gmail.com","46645895464","2026-04-23","2026-04-25"
the response status code should be 201

elements.name: create a booking with incorrect field values

steps.name: user hits endpoint "api/booking"
user books the room with details "","tyru","user.nsbd@gmail.com","46645895464","2026-02-15","2026-02-17"
the response status code should be 400
the user should get response with "Firstname should not be blank,size must be between 3 and 18"

arguments.val: "Firstname should not be blank,size must be between 3 and 18"

elements.name: create a booking with incorrect field values

steps.name: user hits endpoint "api/booking"
user books the room with details "twoc","e","edrft@gmail.com","46645895464","2026-02-15","2026-02-17"
the response status code should be 400
the user should get response with "size must be between 3 and 30"

elements.name: create a booking with incorrect field values

steps.name: user hits endpoint "api/booking"
user books the room with details "ncft","bftg","bcgt","46645895464","2026-02-15","2026-02-17"
the response status code should be 400
the user should get response with "must be a well-formed email address"

elements.name: create a booking with incorrect field values

steps.name: user hits endpoint "api/booking"
user books the room with details "cxst","last","premagth@gmail.com","8795587970","2026-02-15","2026-02-17"
the response status code should be 400
the user should get response with "size must be between 11 and 21"

elements.name: create a booking with incorrect field values

steps.name: user hits endpoint "api/booking"
user books the room with details "atru","last","vfr.ploiu@gmail.com","46645895464","","2026-02-17"
the response status code should be 400
the user should get response with "must not be null"

elements.name: create a booking with incorrect field values

steps.name: user hits endpoint "api/booking"
user books the room with details "atru","last","vfr.ploiu@gmail.com","46645895464","2026-","2026-02-17"
the response status code should be 400
the user should get response with "Failed to create booking"

elements.name: create a booking with incorrect field values

steps.name: user hits endpoint "api/booking"
user books the room with details "atru","last","vfr.ploiu@gmail.com","46645895464","2026-02-17","02-17"
the response status code should be 400
the user should get response with "Failed to create booking"

elements.name: booking a room which is already booked

steps.name: user hits endpoint "api/booking"
user books the room with details "kSDFb","SDFSDf","dsfkjhkjSD@gmail.com","07358480685","2026-02-26","2026-02-27","11"
the response status code should be 201
user hits endpoint "api/booking"
user books the room with details "kSDFb","SDFSDf","dsfkjhkjSD@gmail.com","07358480685","2026-02-26","2026-02-27","11"
the response status code should be 409
user hits endpoint "api/auth/login"
user enters "admin" and "password"
the response status code should be 200
user hits endpoint "api/booking/"
the user deletes the booking with booking ID
the response status code should be 200

elements.name: delete booking

steps.name: user hits endpoint "api/booking"
user books the room with details "boli","moli","dare.july@gmail.com","74185895464","2026-02-12","2026-02-13","88"
the response status code should be 201
user hits endpoint "api/auth/login"
user enters "admin" and "password"
the response status code should be 200
user hits endpoint "api/booking/"
the user deletes the booking with booking ID
the response status code should be 200

elements.name: delete booking error scenario

steps.name: user hits endpoint "api/auth/login"
user enters "admin" and "password"
the response status code should be 200
user hits endpoint "api/booking/"
the user deletes the booking with booking ID "88"
the response status code should be "500"

elements.name: delete booking error scenario

steps.name: user hits endpoint "api/auth/login"
user enters "admin" and "password"
the response status code should be 200
user hits endpoint "api/booking/"
the user deletes the booking with booking ID "@"
the response status code should be "500"

elements.name: delete booking error scenario

steps.name: user hits endpoint "api/auth/login"
user enters "admin" and "password"
the response status code should be 200
user hits endpoint "api/booking/"
the user deletes the booking with booking ID "a"
the response status code should be "500"

elements.name: delete booking error scenario

steps.name: user hits endpoint "api/auth/login"
user enters "admin" and "password"
the response status code should be 200
user hits endpoint "api/booking/"
the user deletes the booking with booking ID ""
the response status code should be "308"

elements.name: Error scenario to check authorization

steps.name: user hits endpoint "api/booking/"
the user deletes the booking without token using booking ID "1"
the response status code should be 401

elements.name: Get the details of the room by room id

steps.name: user hits endpoint "api/auth/login"
user enters "admin" and "password"
the response status code should be 200
user hits endpoint "api/report"
user asks for the booking report
the response status code should be 200

elements.name: Error scenario to check authorization without token

steps.name: user hits endpoint "api/report"
user asks for the booking report without token
the response status code should be 401

elements.name: Error scenario to check authorization passing empty token

steps.name: user hits endpoint "api/report"
user asks for the booking report
the response status code should be 500

elements.name: Get the details of the room by room id

steps.name: user hits endpoint "api/room/","1"
user asks about the room
the response status code should be 200

elements.name: Get the details of the room by room id

steps.name: user hits endpoint "api/room/",""
user asks about the room
the response status code should be 200

elements.name: Get the details of the room by incorrect /invalid room id

steps.name: user hits endpoint "api/room/","a"
user asks about the room
the response status code should be 404

elements.name: Get the details of the room by incorrect /invalid room id

steps.name: user hits endpoint "api/room/","$"
user asks about the room
the response status code should be 404

elements.name: Get the details of the room by room id

steps.name: user hits endpoint "api/room"
user asks about the room
the response status code should be 200

name: Getting a room summary and roomlist

elements.name: Get the availability of the room from dates

steps.name: user hits endpoint "api/room"
user requests the room availability details from "2026-02-15" to "2026-02-17" dates
the response status code should be 200

elements.name: Get the availability of the room from dates

steps.name: user hits endpoint "api/room"
user requests the room availability details from "" to "2025-02-21" dates
the response status code should be 200

elements.name: Get the availability of the room from dates

steps.name: user hits endpoint "api/room"
user requests the room availability details from "2026-02-15" to "" dates
the response status code should be 200

elements.name: Get the availability of the room from dates

steps.name: user hits endpoint "api/room"
user requests the room availability details from "" to "" dates
the response status code should be 200

elements.name: Get the availability of the room without giving dates

steps.name: user hits endpoint "api/room"
user requests the room availability details without giving dates
the response status code should be 200

elements.name: Get the availability  of the room by invalid dates/invalid format

steps.name: user hits endpoint "api/room"
user requests the room availability details from "2026-" to "2026-02-17" dates
the response status code should be 500

steps.name: user hits endpoint "api/room"
user requests the room availability details from "2026-02-20" to "-02-21" dates
the response status code should be 500

the response status code should be 500

elements.name: Get the details of the room by room id

steps.name: user hits endpoint "api/auth/login"
user enters "admin" and "password"
the response status code should be 200
user hits endpoint "api/booking"
user asks the details of the room by room id 1
the response status code should be 200

user hits endpoint "api/booking"
user asks the details of the room by ""
the response status code should be "400"

elements.name: Error scenario to check authorization passing empty token

steps.name: user hits endpoint "api/booking"
user asks the details of the room by "1"
the response status code should be "500"

steps.name: user hits endpoint "api/booking"
user asks the details of the room without token by "1"
the response status code should be "401"

elements.name: Successful login with valid user name and password

steps.name: user hits endpoint "api/auth/login"
user enters "admin" and "password"
the response status code should be 200

elements.name: Failed login with invalid/incorrect user name and password

steps.name: user hits endpoint "api/auth/login"
user enters "ad" and "password"
the response status code should be 401

elements.name: Failed login with invalid/incorrect user name and password

steps.name: user hits endpoint "api/auth/login"
user enters "admin" and "pass"
the response status code should be 401

elements.name: Failed login with invalid/incorrect user name and password

steps.name: user hits endpoint "api/auth/login"
user enters "" and "password"
the response status code should be 401

user enters "admin" and ""
the response status code should be 401

steps.name: user hits endpoint "api/auth/login"
user enters "@%(" and "password"
the response status code should be 401

user enters "admin" and "@%("
